trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the time after a connection is established.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 代表建立连接后的时间。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the time immediately after the browser finishes the domain name lookup for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 代表浏览器完成域名查找的资源后的时间。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the time immediately before the bowser starts requesting the resource from the server
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 代表加油车开始向服务器请求的资源之前的时间

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the timestamp, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 表示时间戳的 DOMHighResTimeStamp ，以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp to be used in initializing the blob event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化blob事件时使用的 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp value (which is a floating-point number) representing the number of milliseconds the user agent estimates are left in the current idle period. The value is ideally accurate to within about 5 microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 值（这是一个浮点数），表示用户代理估计在当前空闲周期中剩余的毫秒数。理想情况下，该值精确到大约5微秒。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp value indicating the time at which the activity described by the statistics in this object was recorded, in milliseconds elapsed since the beginning of January 1, 1970, UTC. This should be accurate to within a few milliseconds but may not be entirely pricise, either because of hardware or operating system limitations or because of fingerprinting protection in the form of reduced clock precision or accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 值，指示自该UTC 1970年1月1日开始经过的毫秒数，该时间记录了该对象中统计信息所描述的活动。由于硬件或操作系统的限制，或者由于降低了时钟精度或准确性的形式的指纹保护，这应该精确到几毫秒，但可能不完全准确。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp which indicates the time at which the target element experienced the intersection change described by the IntersectionObserverEntry. The time is specified in milliseconds since the creation of the containing document.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMHighResTimeStamp 其指示的时间 target 元件经历由所描述的交点变化 IntersectionObserverEntry 。自创建包含文档以来的时间以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp which indicates the time at which the most recent RTP packet from the corresponding source was played out.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMHighResTimeStamp 其指示从相应的源最近的RTP分组被演奏出来的时间。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: A timestamp immediately after receiving the last byte of the response of the last redirect.

trans-unit.source: A timestamp representing a time value equal to the time immediately before the load event of the current document is fired.

trans-unit.source: A timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately after the current document's DOMContentLoaded event completes.

trans-unit.source: A timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the user agent fires the DOMContentLoaded event at the current document.

trans-unit.source: A timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the user agent sets the current document readiness of the current document to interactive.

trans-unit.source: A DOMMatrix or SVGMatrix object to use as the current transformation matrix.

trans-unit.source: A DOMPoint interpreted as a point in the local coordinate system of the element.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMPoint 元素的局部坐标系中解释为一个点。

trans-unit.source: A DOMPointInit-compliant object, which includes both DOMPoint and DOMPointReadOnly, from which to take the values of the new point's properties.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMPointInit 兼容对象，其中包括 DOMPoint 和 DOMPointReadOnly ，从中可以获取新点的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMRect object.

trans-unit.source: A DOMRectReadOnly which describes the part of the target element that's currently visible within the root's intersection rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMRectReadOnly 其描述了目前的根的相交矩形内可见的目标元素的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMRectReadOnly which describes the root intersection rectangle. For roots which are the Document's viewport, this rectangle is the bounds rectangle of the entire document. Otherwise, it's the bounds of the root element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMRectReadOnly ，它描述根相交矩形。对于作为 Document 视口的根，此矩形是整个文档的边界矩形。否则，这就是根元素的界限。

trans-unit.source: A DOMRectReadOnly which describes the smallest rectangle that contains every part of the target element whose intersection change is being described. This value is obtained using the same algorithm as Element.getBoundingClientRect(), so refer to that article for details on precisely what is done to obtain this rectangle and what is and is not included within its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMRectReadOnly 其描述了包含目标元素，其交叉点变化被描述的每一个部分的最小矩形。该值是使用与 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 相同的算法获得的，因此，请参阅该文章，以获取有关为完成此矩形以及该矩形范围内包含和不包含的矩形所做的确切操作的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString

trans-unit.source: A DOMString — one of audio, video or text.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString -一个 audio ， video 或 text 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing a URI.
trans-unit.target: 包含URI 的 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing a URL that can then be used as a document reference in HTML content, or an empty string if the URL can't be generated (such as if the file system implementation doesn't support toURL()).
trans-unit.target: 包含URL 的 DOMString 可以用作HTML内容中的文档引用；如果不能生成URL（例如，如果文件系统实现不支持 toURL() ），则为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing a comma-separated list of window features given with their corresponding values in the form "name=value". These features include options such as the window's default size and position, whether or not to include scroll bars, and so forth. There must be no whitespace in the string. See Window features below for documentation of each of the features that can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,包含以逗号分隔的窗口功能列表，并以“名称=值”的形式给出其对应的值。这些功能包括诸如窗口的默认大小和位置，是否包括滚动条之类的选项。字符串中不得包含空格。有关可以指定的每个功能的文档，请参见下面的窗口功能。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing a sample of the resource that caused the violation, usually the first 40 characters. This will only be populated if the resource is an inline script, event handler, or style — external resources causing a violation will not generate a sample.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其中包含导致违规的资源示例，通常是前40个字符。仅当资源是内联脚本，事件处理程序或样式时才会填充此文件-导致冲突的外部资源将不会生成示例。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing a single DTMF tone character which has just begun to play, or an empty string ("") to indicate that the previous tone has stopped playing. See Tone characters for details on what characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,包含一个刚刚开始播放的DTMF音调字符，或者一个空字符串（ "" ），以指示先前的音调已停止播放。有关允许使用哪些字符的详细信息，请参见音调字符。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing more details about the error that was raised. Note that the spec does not define the exact wording of these messages — this is up to the implementors to decide upon.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发错误的更多详细信息的 DOMString 。请注意，规范未定义这些消息的确切措辞，这取决于实现者来决定。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing one or more class names to match on, separated by whitespace.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 含有一个或多个类名相匹配时，分离由空格。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing one or more selectors to match against. This string must be a valid CSS selector string; if it's not, a SyntaxError exception is thrown. See Locating DOM elements using selectors for more information about using selectors to identify elements. Multiple selectors may be specified by separating them using commas.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 含有一个或多个选择来匹配。该字符串必须是有效的CSS选择器字符串；如果不是，则抛出 SyntaxError 异常。有关使用选择器标识元素的更多信息，请参见使用选择器定位DOM元素。可以通过使用逗号分隔多个选择器来指定它们。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing one or more selectors to match against. This string must be a valid compound selector list supported by the browser; if it's not, a SyntaxError exception is thrown. See Locating DOM elements using selectors for more information about using selectors to identify elements. Multiple selectors may be specified by separating them using commas.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 含有一个或多个选择来匹配。该字符串必须是浏览器支持的有效复合选择器列表。如果不是，则抛出 SyntaxError 异常。有关使用选择器标识元素的更多信息，请参见使用选择器定位DOM元素。可以通过使用逗号分隔多个选择器来指定它们。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing one or more selectors to match. This string must be a valid CSS selector string; if it isn't, a SYNTAX_ERR exception is thrown. See Locating DOM elements using selectors for more about selectors and how to manage them.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 含有一个或多个选择相匹配。该字符串必须是有效的CSS选择器字符串；如果不是，则抛出 SYNTAX_ERR 异常。有关选择器及其管理方法的更多信息，请参见使用选择器定位DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing the DTMF codes to be transmitted to the recipient. Specifying an empty string as the tones parameter clears the tone buffer, aborting any currently queued tones. A "," character inserts a two second delay.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 含有DTMF码将被发送到接收方。将空字符串指定为 tones 参数将清除提示音缓冲区，从而中止任何当前排队的提示音。“，”字符插入两秒钟的延迟。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing the GLSL source code to set.

trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其中包含元素后代的HTML序列化。设置 innerHTML 的值将删除元素的所有后代，并将其替换为通过解析字符串 htmlString 中给定的HTML构造的节点。

trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定要设置其值的属性的名称。在HTML文档中的HTML元素上调用 setAttribute() 时，属性名称将自动转换为所有小写字母。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the browsing context (window, <iframe> or tab) into which to load the specified resource; if the name doesn't indicate an existing context, a new window is created and is given the name specified by windowName. This name can then be used as the target of links and forms by specifying it as the target attribute of <a> or <form> elements. The name should not contain whitespace. Keep in mind that this will not be used as the window's displayed title.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定要将指定资源加载到其中的浏览上下文（窗口， <iframe> 或选项卡）的名称；如果名称不表示现有上下文，则创建一个新窗口，并 windowName 指定由windowName指定的名称。然后，可以通过将该名称指定为 <a> 或 <form> 元素的 target 属性，将该名称用作链接和表单的目标。该名称不应包含空格。请记住，这将不会用作窗口显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the command to execute. See Commands for a list of possible commands.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定要执行的命令的名称。请参阅命令以获取可能的命令列表。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the uniform block to whose index to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定要检索其索引的统一块的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the uniform variable whose location is to be returned. The name can't have any whitespace in it, and you can't use this function to get the location of any uniforms starting with the reserved string "gl_", since those are internal to the WebGL layer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定要返回其位置的统一变量的名称。该名称中不能包含任何空格，并且您不能使用此功能来获取以保留字符串 "gl_" 开头的任何制服的位置，因为它们在WebGL层内部。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the user-defined varying out variable.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定用户定义的变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the variable to bind to the generic vertex index. This name cannot start with "webgl_" or "_webgl_", as these are reserved for use by WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定要绑定到通用顶点索引的变量的名称。该名称不能以“ webgl_”或“ _webgl_”开头，因为它们保留供WebGL使用。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the shape of oscillator wave. The different available values are:
trans-unit.target: 一个指定振荡器波形状的 DOMString 。不同的可用值为：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the text direction. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 指定文本方向。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the text string to render into the context. The text is rendered using the settings specified by font, textAlign, textBaseline, and direction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定要呈现到上下文中的文本字符串。使用 font ， textAlign ， textBaseline 和 direction 指定的设置来呈现文本。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the top-level administrative subdivision within the country in which the address is located. This region has different names in different countries, such as: state, province, oblast, prefecture, or county.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定地址所在国家/地区内的顶级管理分区。该地区在不同国家/地区具有不同的名称，例如：州，省，州，州或县。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the track's human-readable label, if one is available in the track metadata. Otherwise, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定轨道的可读标签（如果轨道元数据中有一个标签）。否则，将返回一个空字符串（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the type of content the media represents. The string is one of those found in Audio track kind strings below.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定媒体表示的内容的类型。该字符串是下面的音频轨道类型字符串中的一种。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the type of content the media represents. The string is one of those found in Video track kind strings below.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定媒体表示的内容的类型。该字符串是以下“ 视频轨道”种类字符串中找到的字符串之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying whether the RTCIceTransport represents the controlling agent or the controlled agent. The value must be one of those found in the enumerated type RTCIceRole:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定 RTCIceTransport 表示控制代理还是受控代理。该值必须是在 RTCIceRole 枚举类型中找到的值之一：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that can have one of these values:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，可以有下列值之一：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that contains diagnostic messages, warning messages, and other information about the last compile operation. When a WebGLShader object is initially created, its information log will be a string of length 0.
trans-unit.target: 包含诊断消息，警告消息以及有关上一次编译操作的其他信息的 DOMString 。当 WebGLShader 最初创建对象，其信息的日志将是长度为0的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that contains diagnostic messages, warning messages, and other information about the last linking or validation operation. When a WebGLProgram object is initially created, its information log will be a string of length 0.
trans-unit.target: 包含诊断消息，警告消息以及有关上一次链接或验证操作的其他信息的 DOMString 。当 WebGLProgram 最初创建对象，其信息的日志将是长度为0的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that defines the type of the message event being created.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它定义要创建的消息事件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that represents the client ID.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示该客户端ID。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString uniquely identifying the payment handler being used to process the payment. This may be either a standardized identifier, or a URL used by the payment processor to handle payments. See Merchant validation in Payment processing concepts for more information.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 唯一地识别所述支付处理程序被用于处理付款。这可以是标准化标识符，也可以是付款处理器用于处理付款的URL。见商家确认在付款处理概念以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString uniquely identifying the source of the statistics contained the RTCTransportStats properties in the RTCStatsReport.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 唯一识别统计的源极包含在 RTCTransportStats 在属性 RTCStatsReport 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which can be used to identify the animation, or null if the animation has no id.
trans-unit.target: 可以用来标识动画的 DOMString ;如果动画没有 id ，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains either the textual data received using the XMLHttpRequest or null if the request failed or has not yet been sent by calling send().
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 其中包含利用接收到的无论是文本数据 XMLHttpRequest 或 null ，如果请求失败或尚未通过调用发送 send() 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the ID string of the element which is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它包含与控件关联的元素的ID字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the ISO3166-1 alpha-2 code identifying the country in which the address is located, or an empty string if no country is available, which frequently can be assumed to mean "same country as the site owner."
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它包含用于标识地址所处国家的ISO3166-1 alpha-2代码；如果没有可用的国家，则为空字符串，通常可以假定它表示“与站点所有者相同的国家”。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the candidate's related address. For both peer and server reflexive candidates, the related address (and related port) are the base for that server or peer reflexive candidate. For relay candidates, the related address and port are set to the mapped address selected by the TURN server.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 其中包含候选人的相关地址。对于对等和服务器自反候选者，相关地址（和相关端口）是该服务器或对等自反候选者的基础。对于中继候选者，相关地址和端口设置为TURN服务器选择的映射地址。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the postal code portion of the address. A postal code is a string (either numeric or alphanumeric) which is used by a postal service to optimize mail routing and delivery.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，其中包含地址的邮政编码部分。邮政编码是一个字符串（数字或字母数字），邮政服务使用该字符串来优化邮件的路由和传递。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which describes the media device. For security reasons, the label is always an empty string ("") if the user has not obtained permission to use at least one media device, either by starting a stream from the microphone or camera, or by persistent permissions being granted.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述媒体设备的 DOMString 。出于安全考虑，如果用户未通过启动麦克风或摄像机的流或通过授予持久性许可而未获得使用至少一个媒体设备的许可，则 label 始终为空字符串（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which encodes the binary content to be sent. You can create the binary string using the FileReader method readAsBinaryString(). The string is converted to binary for transfer by removing the high-order byte of each character.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它编码要发送的二进制内容。您可以使用 FileReader 方法 readAsBinaryString() 创建二进制字符串。通过删除每个字符的高位字节，字符串将转换为二进制以进行传输。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which identifies the track to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它标识要返回的轨道。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which identifies the track, suitable for use when calling getTrackById() on an AudioTrackList such as the one specified by a media element's audioTracks property.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识轨道的 DOMString ，适用于在 AudioTrackList 上调用 getTrackById() 时使用，例如由媒体元素的 audioTracks 属性指定的那个。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which identifies the track, suitable for use when calling getTrackById() on an VideoTrackList such as the one specified by a media element's videoTracks property.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 打电话时其识别轨道，适合使用 getTrackById() 上的 VideoTrackList 如由媒体元素的指定的一个 videoTracks 属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which indicates the track's current mode. The text track mode is one of the values listed below, under Text track mode constants.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 指示轨道的当前模式。文本跟踪模式是“ 文本跟踪模式常量”下下面列出的值之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which indicates what network protocol the candidate uses, UDP or TCP. These values are defined by the enumerated type RTCIceProtocol:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 这表明什么样的网络协议候选用途，UDP或TCP。这些值由枚举类型 RTCIceProtocol 定义：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which is "rtp" for RTP (or RTP and RTCP multiplexed together) candidates or "rtcp" for RTCP candidates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，对于RTP（或RTP和RTCP复用在一起）候选者为 "rtp" ，对于RTCP候选者为 "rtcp" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which is either a number of pixels (such as "10") or a percentage value (like "10%").
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它可以是像素数（例如 "10" ）或百分比值（例如 "10%" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which must be merchantvalidation, the only type of event which uses the MerchantValidationEvent interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，必须是 merchantvalidation ，这是唯一使用 MerchantValidationEvent 接口的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which must contain the string paymentmethodchange, the name of the only type of event which uses the PaymentMethodChangeEvent interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，必须包含字符串 paymentmethodchange ，这是使用 PaymentMethodChangeEvent 接口的唯一事件类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the currency standard used to specify the currency in which the payment value is represented. The default, urn:iso:std:iso:4217, indicates the ISO 4217 standard.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定用于指定表示支付值的 currency 的货币标准。默认值 urn:iso:std:iso:4217 表示ISO 4217标准。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the direction in which the animation should play as well as what to do when the playback reaches the end of the animation sequence in the current direction. It can take one of the following values, with the default being "normal":
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定动画播放的方向，以及在当前方向上播放到达动画序列末尾时的操作。它可以采用以下值之一，默认值为 "normal" ：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the name of the event. There is only one type of RTCDataChannelEvent, so this will always be "datachannel".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定事件的名称。只有一种类型的 RTCDataChannelEvent ，因此它将始终是 "datachannel" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the target peer identity for the RTCPeerConnection. If this value is set (it defaults to null), the RTCPeerConnection will not connect to a remote peer unless it can successfully authenticate with the given name.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定 RTCPeerConnection 的目标对等身份。如果设置了此值（默认为 null ），则 RTCPeerConnection 将不会连接到远程对等方，除非它可以使用给定名称成功进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies which type of statistic is represented by the object. The string comes from the RTCStatsType enum and corrsponds to one of the RTCStats-based statistic object types.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定对象表示哪种统计类型。该字符串来自 RTCStatsType 枚举，并与基于 RTCStats 的统计对象类型之一相对应。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the RTCMediaStreamTrackStats object that provides statistics for the track for which statistics are being collected by this RTCStatsReport.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识 RTCMediaStreamTrackStats 对象，该对象提供此 RTCStatsReport 为其收集统计信息的轨道的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the candidate across all RTCIceTransports on which it is available.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它在所有 RTCIceTransport 唯一地标识候选者。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the currently-selected payment handler. This may be a string chosen from the list of standardized payment method identifiers, or a URL used by the payment processing service. See Payment method identifiers in Payment Request API for more information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 唯一标识当前选定的支付处理程序。这可以是从标准化付款方式标识符列表中选择的字符串，也可以是付款处理服务使用的URL。见付款方式标识符在付款申请API的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the object for which this RTCStats-based object provides statistics.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识此基于 RTCStats 的对象为其提供统计信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the object from which the contents of the stream's RTCCodecStats are derived.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它唯一地标识对象，从该对象派生流的 RTCCodecStats 的内容。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the pairing of source and destination of the transceiver's stream. Its value is taken from the media ID of the SDP m-line. This value is null if negotiation has not completed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 其唯一地标识源和收发器的流的目的地的配对。它的值取自SDP m线的媒体ID。如果协商尚未完成，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the source media component from which the candidate draws data, or null if no such association exists for the candidate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识应聘者从中提取数据的源媒体组件；如果不存在与应聘者的关联，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value comes from the enumerated type RTCIceComponent:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值来自枚举类型 RTCIceComponent ：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is "audio" if the track whose statistics are given by the RTCRtpStreamStats object contains audio, or "video" if the track contains video media.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，其值为 "audio" ，如果其统计数据由被赋予轨道 RTCRtpStreamStats 对象包含音频，或 "video" ，如果轨道包含视频媒体。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is a browsing-session unique identifier for a group of devices which includes the source of the track's contents. Two devices share the same group ID if they belong to the same physical hardware device. For example, a headset has two devices on it: a microphone which can serve as a source for audio tracks and a speaker which can serve as an output for audio.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值是一组设备的浏览会话唯一标识符，其中包括轨道内容的来源。如果两个设备属于同一物理硬件设备，则它们共享相同的组ID。例如，耳机上有两个设备：可以用作音轨源的麦克风和可以用作音频输出的扬声器。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is an origin-unique identifier for the track's source. This ID is valid across multiple browsing sessions for the same origin and is guaranteed to be different for all other origins, so you can safely use it to request the same source be used for multiple sessions, for example.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值是轨道源的唯一来源标识符。此ID在同一来源的多个浏览会话中均有效，并且对于所有其他来源均保证是不同的，因此，例如，您可以放心地使用它来请求将同一来源用于多个会话。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is one of the strings in VideoFacingModeEnum.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值是 VideoFacingModeEnum 中的字符串之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is one of the strings which are a member of the RTCRtpTransceiverDirection enumerated type, indicating the transceiver's preferred direction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值为字符串之一，该字符串是 RTCRtpTransceiverDirection 枚举类型的成员，指示收发器的首选方向。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is one of the strings which are a member of the RTCRtpTransceiverDirection enumerated type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值为字符串之一，该字符串是 RTCRtpTransceiverDirection 枚举类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is one of those defined by the RTCIceCandidateType enumerated type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值是 RTCIceCandidateType 枚举类型定义的值之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is one of those defined by the RTCIceTcpCandidateType enumerated type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值为 RTCIceTcpCandidateType 枚举类型定义的值之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is the name of the organization or company located at the address described by the PaymentAddress object. This should be the name of the organization that is to receive the shipment for shipping addresses, or which is repsonsible for payment for payment addresses.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,其值是位于 PaymentAddress 对象描述的地址上的组织或公司的名称。这应该是要接收装运地址的组织的名称，或者是负责支付地址的付款的组织的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString, whose value is one of those found in the enumerated type RTCIceTransportState, which indicates the stage of ICE gathering that's currently underway. Its value will be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，其值是在枚举类型 RTCIceTransportState 中找到的值之一，该值指示当前正在进行的ICE收集阶段。其值为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString. lang stores a string representing the language version as defined in BCP 47. Examples of valid language codes include "en", "en-US", "fr", "fr-FR", "es-ES", etc.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 。 lang 存储一个字符串，该字符串表示BCP 47中定义的语言版本。有效语言代码的示例包括“ en”，“ en-US”，“ fr”，“ fr-FR”，“ es-ES”等。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString. lang stores a string representing the language version as defined in BCP 47. Examples of valid language codes include "en", "en-US", "fr", "fr-FR", "es-ES", etc.
A DOMString. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString:
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ：

trans-unit.source: A string of the drag item's type. Some example types are text/html and text/plain.
trans-unit.target: 一个 string 拖动项目的类型。一些示例类型是 text/html 和 text/plain 。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the network protocol used to fetch the resource, as identified by the ALPN Protocol ID (RFC7301).
trans-unit.target: 甲 string 表示网络协议用于获取资源，所确定的ALPN协议ID（RFC7301） 。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the type of resource that initiated the performance event, as specified above.
trans-unit.target: 甲 string 表示类型发起性能事件，如上面所指定的资源的。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the drag item's data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 string 表示拖动项目的数据。

trans-unit.source: A string which is one of the values listed above.
trans-unit.target: 一个 string ，它是上面列出的值之一。

trans-unit.source: A string which specifies the type of data to remove. If this parameter is an empty string or is not provided, the data for all types is removed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 string ，指定要删除的数据类型。如果此参数为空字符串或未提供，则将删除所有类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: A DOMTokenList.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMTokenList 。

trans-unit.source: A DynamicsCompressorNode.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DynamicsCompressorNode 。

trans-unit.source: A Element object whose bounding box is used as the bounds of the viewport for the purposes of determining how much of the target element is visible. The intersection of this bounding rectangle, offset by any margins specified in the options passed to the IntersectionObserver() constructor, the target element's bounds, minus the bounds of every element or other object which overlaps the target element, is considered to be the visible area of the target element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Element 对象，其边界框用作视口的边界，目的是确定可见多少目标元素。该边界矩形的 IntersectionObserver() 偏移传递给IntersectionObserver（）构造函数的选项中指定的任何边距），目标元素的边界减去每个元素或与目标元素重叠的其他对象的边界，都被视为可见区域目标元素的

trans-unit.source: A File object. No type needs to be given in this case.
trans-unit.target: 一个 File 对象。在这种情况下，无需输入任何类型。

trans-unit.source: A File, Blob or MediaSource object to create an object URL for.
trans-unit.target: 一个 File ， Blob 或 MediaSource 的对象来创建一个URL对象。

trans-unit.source: A list of the files in a drag operation, one list item for each file in the operation. If the drag operation had no files, the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 拖动操作中文件的 list ，操作中每个文件的一个列表项。如果拖动操作没有文件，则列表为空。

trans-unit.source: A FullscreenOptions object providing options that control the behavior of the transition to full-screen mode. Currently, the only option is navigationUI, which controls whether or not to show navigation UI while the element is in full-screen mode. "crop-and-scale" means that the UA can use cropping and downscaling on the camera output in order to satisfy other constraints that affect the resolution.

trans-unit.source: A DOMString identifying the peer who has sole access to the stream. If this property is specified, only the indicated peer can receive and use the stream. Streams isolated in this way can only be displayed in a media element (<audio> or <video>) where the content is protected just as if CORS cross-origin rules were in effect. When a peer identity is set, MediaStreamTracks from that peer have their isolated flag set to true.

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating the current value of the deviceId property. The device ID is a origin-unique string identifying the source of the track; this is usually a GUID. This value is specific to the source of the track's data and is not usable for setting constraints; it can, however, be used for initially selecting media when calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia().
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 指示的当前值 deviceId 属性。设备ID是唯一的起点字符串，用于标识轨道的来源。这通常是GUID。该值特定于轨道数据的来源，不可用于设置约束；但是，可以在调用 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() 时将其用于最初选择媒体。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating the current value of the groupId property. The group ID is a browsing session-unique string identifying the source group of the track. Two devices (as identified by the deviceId) are considered part of the same group if they are from the same physical device. For instance, the audio input and output devices for the speaker and microphone built into a phone would share the same group ID, since they're part of the same physical device. The microphone on a headset would have a different ID, though. This value is specific to the source of the track's data and is not usable for setting constraints; it can, however, be used for initially selecting media when calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia().
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指示 groupId 属性的当前值。组ID是标识会话源组的唯一浏览会话字符串。如果两个设备（由 deviceId 标识）来自同一物理设备，则它们被视为同一组的一部分。例如，内置在电话中的扬声器和麦克风的音频输入和输出设备将共享相同的组ID，因为它们是同一物理设备的一部分。但是，头戴式耳机上的麦克风具有不同的ID。该值特定于轨道数据的来源，不可用于设置约束；但是，可以在调用 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() 时将其用于最初选择媒体。

trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 指示的范围 <th> 细胞。可以使用 scope 属性配置标题单元格，将其应用于指定的行或列，或者应用于当前行组中的尚未作用域的单元格（即，相同的祖先 <thead> ， <tbody> 或 <tfoot> 元素）。如果没有为 scope 指定值，则标头不会以这种方式直接与单元格关联。 scope 允许值为：

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating the type of candidate as one of the strings from the RTCIceCandidateType enumerated type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指示候选类型，作为 RTCIceCandidateType 枚举类型的字符串之一。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating the type of statistics the object contains, taken from the enum type RTCStatsType.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指示对象包含的统计信息的类型，取自枚举类型 RTCStatsType 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating what the current state of the ICE agent is. The value of state can be used to determine whether the ICE agent has made an initial connection using a viable candidate pair ("connected"), made its final selection of candidate pairs ("completed"), or in an error state ("failed"), among other states. See the RTCIceTransportState enumerated type for a complete list of states.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 指示ICE代理的当前状态是什么。 state 的值可用于确定ICE代理是否已使用可行的候选对（ "connected" ）进行了初始连接，是否最终选择了候选对（ "completed" ）或处于错误状态（ "failed" ）以及其他州。有关状态的完整列表，请参见 RTCIceTransportState 枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString indicating which gathering state the ICE agent is currently in. The value is one of those included in the RTCIceGathererState enumerated type: "new", "gathering", or "complete".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指示ICE代理当前处于哪个收集状态。该值是 RTCIceGathererState 枚举类型中包含的值之一： "new" ， "gathering" 或 "complete" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString object containing a human-readable string which provides specific diagnostic information to help the reader understand the error condition which occurred; specifically, it isn't simply a summary of what the error code means, but actual diagnostic information to help in understanding what exactly went wrong. This text and its format is not defined by the specification and will vary from one user agent to another. If no diagnostics are available, or no explanation can be provided, this value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 对象，它包含一个人类可读的字符串，该字符串提供特定的诊断信息，以帮助读者理解所发生的错误情况；具体来说，它不仅是错误代码含义的摘要，还包括实际的诊断信息，可帮助您了解到底出了什么问题。该文本及其格式未由规范定义，并且从一个用户代理到另一个用户代理将有所不同。如果没有可用的诊断程序或无法提供任何说明，则此值为空字符串（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString of the internal subset, or null if there is none. Eg "<!ELEMENT foo (bar)>".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 内部子集，或者 null ，如果是没有的。例如 "<!ELEMENT foo (bar)>" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString providing a human-readable label for the track. For example, a track whose kind is "sign" might have a label of "A sign-language interpretation". This string is empty if no label is provided.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它为轨道提供了易于阅读的标签。例如，跟踪其 kind 是 "sign" 可能有 label 的 "A sign-language interpretation" 。如果未提供标签，则此字符串为空。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString providing a human-readable label for the track. For example, an audio commentary track for a movie might have a label of "Commentary with director John Q. Public and actors John Doe and Jane Eod." This string is empty if no label is provided.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它为轨道提供了易于阅读的标签。例如，一个音频评论轨道的电影可能有 label 的 "Commentary with director John Q. Public and actors John Doe and Jane Eod." 如果未提供标签，则此字符串为空。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString providing a postal sorting code such as is used in France.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 提供邮政分拣代码如在法国被使用。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString providing a unique payment method identifier for the payment handler that's requiring validation. This may be either one of the standard payment method identifier strings or a URL that both identifies and handles requests for the payment handler, such as https://apple.com/apple-pay.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 提供对于用于需要验证的支付处理程序的唯一付款方式标识符。这可以是标准付款方式标识符字符串之一，也可以是既标识并处理付款处理程序请求的URL，例如 https://apple.com/apple-pay 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the CORS setting for the script element. For scripts from other origins, this controls if error information will be exposed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 反映CORS设定为脚本元素。对于其他来源的脚本，此控件控制是否公开错误信息。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the name HTML attribute, containing the name of the field set, used for submitting the form.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 反映 name HTML属性，包含字段集的名称，用于提交的形式。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the name HTML attribute, containing the name for the control that is submitted with form data.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 反映 name HTML属性，包含名称为与表格数据提交的控制。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the name HTML attribute, containing the name of this control used by servers and DOM search functions.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 反映 name HTML属性，包含由服务器和DOM搜索功能使用该控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form control (the first selected option). Returns the value attribute of the option element or if it is missing, the text attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,反映表单控件的值（第一个选择的选项）。返回选项元素的value属性，如果缺少，则返回text属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's accept-charset HTML attribute, representing the character encoding that the server accepts.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,反映了表单的 accept-charset HTML属性的值，表示服务器接受的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's action HTML attribute, containing the URI of a program that processes the information submitted by the form.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,反映了表单的 action HTML属性的值，其中包含处理表单提交的信息的程序的URI。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's autocomplete HTML attribute, indicating whether the controls in this form can have their values automatically populated by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它反映了表单的 autocomplete HTML属性的值，指示此表单中的控件是否可以由浏览器自动填充其值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's enctype HTML attribute, indicating the type of content that is used to transmit the form to the server. Only specified values can be set. The two properties are synonyms.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它反映表单的 enctype HTML属性的值，指示用于将表单传输到服务器的内容的类型。只能设置指定的值。这两个属性是同义词。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's method HTML attribute, indicating the HTTP method used to submit the form. Only specified values can be set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,反映表单的 method HTML属性的值，指示用于提交表单的HTTP方法。只能设置指定的值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's name HTML attribute, containing the name of the form.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它反映了表单 name HTML属性的值，其中包含表单名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString reflecting the value of the form's target HTML attribute, indicating where to display the results received from submitting the form.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它反映了表单的 target HTML属性的值，指示在何处显示提交表单后收到的结果。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a localized message that describes the validation constraints that the control does not satisfy (if any). This attribute is the empty string if the control is not a candidate for constraint validation (willValidate is false), or it satisfies its constraints.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示描述了验证约束，所述控制不满足（如果有的话）的本地化消息。如果控件不是约束验证的候选者（ willValidate 为false），或者控件满足约束，则此属性为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a localized message that describes the validation constraints that the control does not satisfy (if any). This is the empty string if the control is not a candidate for constraint validation (willValidate is false), or it satisfies its constraints.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示描述了验证约束，所述控制不满足（如果有的话）的本地化消息。如果控件不是约束验证的候选者（ willValidate 为 false ），或者满足其约束，则为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a localized message that describes the validation constraints that the element does not satisfy (if any). This is the empty string if the element is not a candidate for constraint validation (willValidate is false), or it satisfies its constraints.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示描述了验证约束，该元素不满足（如果有的话）的本地化消息。如果该元素不是约束验证的候选者（ willValidate 为 false ），或者它满足其约束，则为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a sample of the resource that caused the violation, usually the first 40 characters. This will only be populated if the resource is an inline script, event handler, or style — external resources causing a violation will not generate a sample.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,代表引起违规的资源样本，通常是前40个字符。仅当资源是内联脚本，事件处理程序或样式时才会填充此文件-导致冲突的外部资源将不会生成示例。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a serialized media query.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 表示序列化媒体查询。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing a unique ID for the event.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示用于事件的唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing an enumerated property indicating alignment of the element's contents with respect to the surrounding context. The possible values are "left", "right", "justify", and "center".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 表示一个枚举的属性，该属性指示元素的内容相对于周围上下文的对齐方式。可能的值为 "left" ， "right" ， "justify" 和 "center" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing an enumerated value indicating how the content of the cell must be vertically aligned. It reflects the valign attribute and can have one of the following values: "top", "middle", "bottom", or "baseline". Use the CSS vertical-align property instead.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 表示一个枚举值，该值指示必须如何垂直对齐单元格的内容。它反映了 valign 属性，并且可以具有以下值之一： "top" ， "middle" ， "bottom" 或 "baseline" 。请改用CSS vertical-align 属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the URL of the source.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示源的URL。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the current value.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示当前值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the default value of the element, initially the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示元素的默认值，最初为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the directive whose enforcement uncovered the violation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,表示其指令发现其违规的指令。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the local part of the qualified name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,表示属性合格名称的本地部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the local part of the qualified name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,表示元素的限定名称的本地部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the namespace URI of the attribute, or null if there is no namespace.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示属性，或的命名空间URI null ，如果没有命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the namespace prefix of the attribute, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示属性，或命名空间前缀 null 如果没有指定前缀。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the namespace prefix of the element, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示元，或命名空间前缀 null 如果没有指定前缀。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the transport address for the candidate that can be used for connectivity checks. The format of this address is a candidate-attribute as defined in RFC 5245. This string is empty ("") if the RTCIceCandidate is an "end of candidates" indicator.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示传输地址可以被用于连接性检查的候选者。该地址的格式是RFC 5245中定义的 candidate-attribute 。如果 RTCIceCandidate 是“候选对象结束”指示符，则此字符串为空（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the type of performance metric such as, for example, "mark". See property page for valid values.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 较性能度量，如类型，例如，“ mark ”。请参阅属性页以获取有效值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the value of the id attribute on the given element, or the empty string if id is not present.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示的值 id 给定的元件，或空字符串上属性如果 id 不存在。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString representing the value of the contents of the elements. Behaves like the Node.textContent property.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 表示的元素的含量的值。行为类似于 Node.textContent 属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString represeting the form control's type. When multiple is true, it returns "select-multiple"; otherwise, it returns "select-one".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 重新设置表单控件的类型。当 multiple 是 true ，则返回 "select-multiple" ; 否则，返回 "select-one" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying a code used by a jurisdiction for mail routing, for example, the ZIP code in the United States or the PIN code in India.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定一个司法辖区用于邮件路由的代码，例如，美国的邮政编码或印度的PIN码。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying an error message to present to the user. When calling updateWith(), including error in the updated data causes the user agent to display the text as a general error message. For address field specific errors, use shippingAddressErrors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定要显示给用户的错误消息。调用 updateWith() 时，在更新的数据中包含 error 会导致用户代理将文本显示为常规错误消息。对于特定于地址字段的错误，请使用 shippingAddressErrors 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the audio track's primary language, or an empty string if unknown. The language is specified as a BCP 47 (RFC 5646) language code, such as "en-US" or "pt-BR".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 指定音轨的主要语言，或一个空字符串，如果不明。该语言被指定为BCP 47（RFC 5646）语言代码，例如 "en-US" 或 "pt-BR" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the candidate's media stream identification tag which uniquely identifies the media stream within the component with which the candidate is associated, or null if no such association exists.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定候选人的媒体流标识标签，该标签可唯一标识与候选人相关联的组件内的媒体流，如果不存在此类关联，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the category into which the track falls. For example, the main audio track would have a kind of "main".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定轨道所属的类别。例如，主音频轨道会有一个 kind 的 "main" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the category into which the track falls. For example, the main video track would have a kind of "main".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定轨道所属的类别。例如，主视频轨道会有一个 kind 的 "main" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the country in which the address is located, using the ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 standard. The string is always given in its canonical upper-case form. Some examples of valid country values: "US", "GB", "CN", or "JP".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，使用ISO-3166-1 alpha-2标准指定地址所在的国家/地区。字符串始终以规范的大写形式给出。有效 country 值的一些示例： "US" ， "GB" ， "CN" 或 "JP" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the name of the organization, firm, company, or institution at the payment address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定付款地址上的组织，公司，公司或机构的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the number of pixels wide the cell should be drawn, if possible. This property reflects the also obsolete width attribute. Use the CSS width property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，应绘制一个 DOMString ,它指定单元格宽度的像素数。此属性反映了过时的 width 属性。请改用CSS width 属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the region of the address, represented as a "code element" of an ISO3166-2 country subdivision name (e.g. "QLD" for Queensland, Australia, "CA" for California, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 一个指定地址区域的 DOMString ，表示为ISO3166-2国家/地区分区名称的“代码元素” （例如，澳大利亚昆士兰州为“ QLD”，加利福尼亚州为“ CA”，依此类推）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the session's password string.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,指定会话的密码字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the telephone number of the recipient or contact person.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定收件人或联系人的电话号码。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the tone which has begun playing, or an empty string ("") if the previous tone has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定开始播放的音调，如果前一个音调已经播放完毕，则为空字符串（ "" ）。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the track's current mode. Changing this property's value changes the track's current mode to match. Permitted values are listed under Text track mode constants.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,用于指定轨道的当前模式。更改此属性的值将更改轨道的当前模式以匹配。允许的值在“ 文本”跟踪模式常量下列出。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the value of the ICE session's username fragment field, ufrag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ,它指定ICE会话的用户名片段字段 ufrag 的值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString specifying the video track's primary language, or an empty string if unknown. The language is specified as a BCP 47 (RFC 5646) language code, such as "en-US" or "pt-BR".
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 指定视频轨道的主要语言，或一个空字符串，如果不明。该语言被指定为BCP 47（RFC 5646）语言代码，例如 "en-US" 或 "pt-BR" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that contains the name of the connected database.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 包含连接数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that identifies the cue.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 标识线索。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that identifies the region.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 标识区域。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString that sets or returns the return value for the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 该设置或返回的对话框返回值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString uniquely identifying the object which was inspected to produce the RTCTransportStats object associated with this RTP stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 唯一地标识要检查的对象，以检查生成与该RTP流关联的 RTCTransportStats 对象。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString value of the server-specified metric description, or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 服务器指定的度量描述，或空字符串的值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString value of the server-specified metric name.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 服务器指定的度量标准名称的价值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which can be used on <th> elements (not on <td>), specifying an alternative label for the header cell.. This alternate label can be used in other contexts, such as when describing the headers that apply to a data cell. This is used to offer a shorter term for use by screen readers in particular, and is a valuable accessibility tool. Usually the value of abbr is an abbreviation or acronym, but can be any text that's appropriate contextually.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 它可以在使用 <th> 元件（未在 <td> ），指定用于所述标题单元的替代标记。这替代标记可以在适用于一个数据其它环境中，例如描述该头时作为可以使用细胞。这用于提供较短的期限，尤其是供屏幕阅读器使用，并且是一种有价值的辅助工具。通常， abbr 的值是缩写或首字母缩写，但是可以是任何适合上下文的文本。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the city or town portion of the address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString 包含地址的城市或城镇的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which contains the list of DTMF tones currently in the queue to be transmitted (tones which have already been played are no longer included in the string). See toneBuffer for details on the format of the tone buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，其中包含当前要发送的队列中DTMF音的列表（已播放的音不再包含在字符串中）。有关音频缓冲区格式的详细信息，请参见 toneBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which identifies the track, if it has one. If it doesn't have an ID, then this value is an empty string (""). If the TextTrack is associated with a <track> element, then the track's ID matches the element's ID.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 其识别轨道，如果它有一个。如果没有ID，则此值为空字符串（ "" ）。如果 TextTrack 与 <track> 元素相关联，则轨道的ID与该元素的ID相匹配。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which indicates whether the candidate is an RTP or an RTCP candidate; its value is either "rtp" or "rtcp", and is derived from the "component-id" field in the candidate a-line string. The permitted values are listed in the RTCIceComponent enumerated type.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMString 其指示所述候选是否是RTP或RTCP的候选; 它的值是 "rtp" 或 "rtcp" ，并且从 candidate a行字符串中的 "component-id" 字段派生。允许的值在 RTCIceComponent 枚举类型中列出。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the target peer identity for the RTCPeerConnection. If this value is set (it defaults to null), the RTCPeerConnection will not connect to a remote peer unless it can successfully authenticate with the given name.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定 RTCPeerConnection 的目标对等身份。如果设置了此值（默认为 null ），则 RTCPeerConnection 将不会连接到远程对等方，除非它可以使用给定名称成功进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which specifies the text language in which the text track's contents is written. The value must adhere to the format specified in the Tags for Identifying Languages (BCP 47) document from the IETF, just like the HTML lang attribute. For example, this can be "en-US" for United States English or "pt-BR" for Brazilian Portuguese.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它指定用于编写文本轨道内容的文本语言。该值必须遵循IETF的“ 用于标识语言的标签（BCP 47）”文档中指定的格式，就像HTML lang 属性一样。例如，对于美国英语，可以是 "en-US" ；对于巴西葡萄牙语，可以是“ "pt-BR" 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the RTCMediaStreamTrackStats object representing the associated MediaStreamTrack. This is not the same as the value of MediaStreamTrack.id.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识代表关联的 MediaStreamTrack 的 RTCMediaStreamTrackStats 对象。这是不一样的价值 MediaStreamTrack.id 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the object which was inspected to produce the RTCCodecStats object associated with this RTP stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它唯一地标识要检查的对象以生成与此RTP流关联的 RTCCodecStats 对象。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the object which was inspected to produce this object based on RTCStats.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它根据 RTCStats 唯一地标识要检查的对象以产生此对象。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the object which was inspected to produce this object based on RTCStats. This allows any two RTCStats-based objects which were produced from the same data to be correlated to one another. The format of this ID is not defined by the specification, so it cannot be relied upon to have any particular format, structure, or meaning beyond that.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，它根据 RTCStats 唯一地标识要检查的对象以产生此对象。这允许从相同数据产生的任何两个基于 RTCStats 的对象相互关联。该ID的格式不是由规范定义的，因此不能依赖它具有任何特定的格式，结构或含义。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the track within the media. This ID can be used to locate a specific track within a video track list by calling VideoTrackList.getTrackById(). The ID can also be used as the fragment part of the URL if the media supports seeking by media fragment per the Media Fragments URI specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识媒体中的轨道。通过调用 VideoTrackList.getTrackById() ,可以使用此ID在视频轨道列表中查找特定轨道。如果媒体支持根据媒体片段URI规范按媒体片段进行搜索，则ID也可以用作URL的片段部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which uniquely identifies the track within the media. This ID can be used to locate a specific track within an audio track list by calling AudioTrackList.getTrackById(). The ID can also be used as the fragment part of the URL if the media supports seeking by media fragment per the Media Fragments URI specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，用于唯一标识媒体中的轨道。通过调用 AudioTrackList.getTrackById() ,可以使用此ID在音频轨道列表中查找特定轨道。如果媒体支持根据媒体片段URI规范按媒体片段进行搜索，则ID也可以用作URL的片段部分。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which, if present, indicates that the languageCode property of the PaymentAddress could not be validated. The contents of the string provide a human-readable explanation of the validation failure, and ideally suggestions to correct the problem.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString （如果存在），指示不能验证 PaymentAddress 的 languageCode 属性。字符串的内容为验证失败提供了易于理解的解释，并提供了纠正问题的理想建议。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString which, if set, specifies an RTP stream ID (RID) to be sent using the RID header extension. This parameter cannot be modified using setParameters(). Its value can only be set when the transceiver is first created.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString （如果已设置），它指定使用RID标头扩展名发送的RTP流ID（RID）。无法使用 setParameters() 修改此参数。仅在首次创建收发器时才能设置其值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString whose value is "audio" if the associated MediaStreamTrack is audio-only or "video" if the track contains video. This value will match that of the media type indicated by RTCCodecStats.codec, as well as the track's kind property. Previously called mediaType.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，如果关联的 MediaStreamTrack 是纯音频的，则值为 "audio" "video" 如果该轨道包含视频，则为“ video”。该值将与 RTCCodecStats.codec 指示的媒体类型以及轨道的 kind 属性匹配。以前称为 mediaType 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString, eg "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN", empty string for HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，如 "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" ，对HTML5的空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString, eg "html" for <!DOCTYPE HTML>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，如 "html" 的 <!DOCTYPE HTML> 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString, eg "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd", empty string for HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMString ，如 "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd" ，对HTML5的空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the network protocol used to fetch the resource, as identified by the ALPN Protocol ID (RFC7301).
trans-unit.target: 甲 string 表示网络协议用于获取资源，所确定的ALPN协议ID（RFC7301） 。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the type of resource that initiated the performance entry, as specified in PerformanceResourceTiming.initiatorType.
trans-unit.target: 一个 string 代表启动性能条目的资源类型，如 PerformanceResourceTiming.initiatorType 中所指定。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the navigation type. Must be: "navigate", "reload", "back_forward" or "prerender".
trans-unit.target: 甲 string 表示导航类型。必须为：“ navigate ”，“ reload ”，“ back_forward ”或“ prerender ”。

trans-unit.source: A DOMStringMap object which provides a list of key/value pairs of named data attributes which correspond to custom data attributes attached to the element. These can also be defined in SVG using attributes of the form data-*, where * is the key name for the pair. This works just like HTML's HTMLElement.dataset property and HTML's data-* global attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMStringMap 对象，提供命名数据属性的键/值对的列表，这些数据对应于附加到元素的自定义数据属性。也可以在SVG中使用 data-* 形式的属性来定义它们，其中 * 是该对的键名。就像HTML的 HTMLElement.dataset 属性和HTML的 data-* 全局属性一样。

trans-unit.source: A DOMTokenList reflecting the for HTML attribute, containing a list of IDs of other elements in the same document that contribute to (or otherwise affect) the calculated value.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMTokenList 反映 for HTML属性，包含在同一文件中的其他元素，有助于（或以其他方式影响）所计算的ID的列表 value 。

trans-unit.source: A fetch() promise only rejects when a network error is encountered (which is usually when there’s a permissions issue or similar). A fetch() promise does not reject on HTTP errors (404, etc.). Instead, a then handler must check the Response.ok and/or Response.status properties.
trans-unit.target: 一 fetch() 承诺只在遇到网络故障时，可以拒绝（这通常是在有一个权限问题或类似）。甲 fetch() 承诺不拒绝对HTTP错误（404等）。而是， then 处理程序必须检查 Response.ok 和/或 Response.status 属性。
